text: Te'omra lagate arau dujana yuraka karaagarata praraesa karaile. Sihamtara ejane ka’le, ‘ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i madara babe anura nihsarana karai acho’, arau anajane ka’le, ‘ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i mora murata rauti karhiya'i nicho arau caraa'iye tara paraa kha'i ache. Apuni amaka iyara tatparya jana'i diyaka, ami dekhicho apuni muhachinasakalara antarbhukta’
